directions: Combine goat cheese, cream cheese, 5 garlic scapes, lemon zest, lemon juice, salt, and garlic in a bowl; mix with a fork until blended. Scoop into a serving bowl. Garnish with remaining garlic scape and toasted pecans.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package goat cheese, at room temperature
1 (4 ounce) package cream cheese, at room temperature
6 fresh garlic scapes, minced, or more to taste, divided
title: Garlic Scape Goat Cheese Dip
